name: Every frameCount Pixels
description:
Starting from the first pixel at the top left, proceeding to the right, and then in the following rows of pixels:
- at frame 1, white dots are drawn all (every 1 pixel)
- at frame 2, white dots are drawn every 2 pixels
- at frame 3, white dots are drawn every 3 pixels
- ...   

Antonio Belluscio (@livinbits)
December 2021 (first version: 2015)

Instructions:
- click or tap -> setting an interval to restart pixel count cyclically
- fullscreen -> optimal enjoyment

PS: The name "frameCount" comes from the Processing variable that contains the frame number to be drawn.
